summary: lol i’m not surprised a lot of ppl dont know about captian marvel aka carol danvors’ origin story. she was never that...
body:
lol i’m not surprised a lot of ppl dont know about captian marvel aka carol danvors’ origin story. she was never that mainstream, the reason marvel chose to recently popularize her after like what secret invasion? the push the moment they redesigned her with her new not-lesbian quiff? and mantal change from what warbird? she was always a tragic hero. a fave but tragic: the whole retcon they had to do about that rape and impregnated . getting her ass whooped by rogue every time? her wanting to known as captain marvel this insecurity, dream she couldnt obtain until house of m. that whole pointless as civil war 2 that made her unsympathetic?  the most you knew about this character was that she was maybe the source for rogue’s superhuman strength, durability and flight.

but what’s this new origin? seems corny and pointless.

but what’s this new origin? seems corny and pointless.

This week on Hard NOC Life, Shawn and Keith discuss the news from the waning days of summer, including Childish Gambino’s latest, the new Jack Ryan series on Amazon, and the reveal of Brie Larson as Carol Danvers, aka Captain Marvel.

title: Ben Mendelsohn in Marvel movie!!!
body: Ben Mendelsohn will be starring in the freshest Marvel movie - ‘Captain Marvel’. Ben’s character is unknown yet, but there are some rumors that he will be playing as the villanous Skrull leader known as Talos. During making this movie, Ben is working with Jude Law, Brie Larson and Samuel L. Jackson. Can’t wait to go to the cinema to see it! :D

summary: Entertainment Weekly’s Captain Marvel Exclusive Paging Carol Danvers. Captain Marvel is on the cover of Entertainment Weekly’s...
caption:
Entertainment Weekly’s Captain Marvel Exclusive

Paging Carol Danvers.

Captain Marvel is on the cover of Entertainment Weekly’s latest issue, and we’ve got the first look at Brie Larson’s part-Kree, part-human hero. Audiences briefly saw Carol’s symbol in the end-credits scene of Avengers: Infinity War, but come March 2019, the Air Force pilot with alien powers will be getting her own origin story.

Not only is Captain Marvel the first solo, female-led movie in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, but it’s an introduction to the most powerful hero the MCU has ever seen. (Another Marvel first: It’s set in the 1990s!) Click through for an in-depth look at all things Carol — as well as an introduction to a few of her friends and foes.

https://ew.com/movies/captain-marvel-first-look-images/

summary: Avengers: Infinity War, Kevin Feige parla della richiesta d'aiuto a Capitan Marvel
title: Avengers: Infinity War, Kevin Feige parla della richiesta d'aiuto a Capitan Marvel
body:
Avengers: Infinity War, Kevin Feige parla della richiesta d’aiuto a Capitan Marvel

Entertainment Weekly negli ultimi giorni ci ha fatto salire un hype smisurato per Captain Marvel dopo aver mostrato le prime immagini ufficiali del film, e la rivista sta continuando a rilasciare sul proprio sito diverse dichirazioni che ha raccolto parlando con chi ha contribuito a creare la pellicola. Dopo aver scambiato due chiacchiere con Anna Boden, co-regista, e Brie Larson, interprete del…

View On WordPress

summary: There was a dude who literally asked why they turned Captain America into a woman?  After the first confusion I laughed at least...
body:
There was a dude who literally asked why they turned Captain America into a woman? 

After the first confusion I laughed at least ten minutes. I mean he can’t be serious, right? But he was.

title: Captain Marvel (first trailer).
body:
Captain Marvel (first trailer).

Here’s the trailer for the upcoming Captain Marvel movie in which the Earth is threatened by the Kree Empire and only Brie Larson can save the day, well, as Captain Marvel.

Captain Marvel will hit the cinema on March 8th 2019.
